programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 - Cradle of Mankind Ep5
programme.desc: Wildlife expert and safari guide Jean Du Plessis travels to Mahale Mountains National Park in the hopes of spending time with the wild chimpanzees that live in the forests of this remote and protected corner of Tanzania.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as they’re foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnam’s twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal family’s tragedy is another’s holiday dinner as New Zealand’s mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Madagascar in Cold Blood Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the lives of Madagascar’s cold-blooded creatures. Chameleons, frog, lizards, and snakes have all adapted in order to survive on the island. We take a look at how they find food, reproduce, and avoid predators.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Lean on Me Ep2
programme.desc: Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - Growing Pains Ep3
programme.desc: Experience a roller coaster of emotions and growing pains as the sanctuary’s orangutans move through six grades toward their release into the wild. Discover how Dilla’s fate suddenly changes, and watch as big boy Beni goes on an unwelcome diet.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the sun’s heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Castaway Island Ep2
programme.desc: This film travels around the island visiting some of its most striking landscapes to explore how Madagascar’s species have evolved over time. Madagascar is a strangely beautiful and unique world with a staggering array of habitats and special landscapes.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 - A Wild Education Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flambė. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Clinging In The Rain / Raccoon Hoarder Picture Show - Lucretia stretches the truth when given the chance to hang with the Harvey Girl. The girls’ set out to retrieve their Horn-a-Corn dream house after being stolen by raccoons.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Chicken Has Landed / The Night Of The Nibbler - Archibald takes an unexpected trip to outer space. When a yummy recipe goes missing, Archibald P.I. sets out to crack the case.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep38

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert And The Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep19
programme.desc: Lots Of Raa'S In The Jungle - Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc… until Zebby wonders what zebras do… together the animals discover that zebras stampede… which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Things - Raa Raa wants to show Topsy his three favourite things. But when he gets to his friends house, they have disappeared. Raa Raa and his friends set out on a noisy adventure to find the missing objects

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy'S Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo'S Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep25
programme.desc: The Reflesherator / Master Blister - The Reflesherator When Professor Burns requires a substitute teacher, Flyboy's dad volunteers for the job. Master Blister The students of Scare School are thrilled after a prank played on Alder and Dash results in their firing.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep10
programme.desc: Rebirth - When a Galra monster descends upon the Balmera, Team Voltron must find a way to save the deteriorating living planet and its alien inhabitants

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep10
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter One - Eager to come face-to-face with a real life monster, Rocky and Bullwinkle buy a creepy old mansion in hopes of finding a real monster

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep13
programme.desc: Night - The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Primrose Classic / The Blimpateers - A professional paper airplane thrower hires Archibald to be his caddie. While floating through the sky, Archibald bumps into birds who live in a blimp.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End Of The Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls’ joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes/Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep12
programme.desc: Sitting On Babies / Best Frenemies - Things go very wrong when Tip and Oh watch the Gorg babies at a cheese-themed playland/Captain Smek pretends to be Oh's friend just to ruin his day.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom - Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep51
programme.desc: Why Meerkat Is Always On The Look Out - You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep51
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfunny Clown - Noddy and his friends are having a “clown day” and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far. Using all his detecting skills and reconsidering evidence, Noddy works out that the unfunny clown is actually Fuse! He didn't realise that the clowning jokes he was playing on the other toys weren't actually funny! Noddy shows Fuse a way in which he can join in with the clowning in a safe way and Clown Day can go ahead after all. Well done Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: Noddy And The Case Of The Raining Carrots - Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep51
programme.desc: Why Are Acorns Buried Under The Tree? - Jess and the puppies find a pile of acorns buried under a tree. The puppies want to play with them, but Jess thinks they should find out why the acorns are buried there first. That's the Big Question! Baa and Billie don't know – Billie says she'd eat acorns rather than bury them! Jess goes off to see Mimi who's planting her conker to grow a chestnut tree. Jess wonders if someone planted the acorns to grown into an oak but Mimi doesn't think so. They'd need to be buried somewhere with more space to grow. Jess tries Willow who is storing apples for the winter. She explains that she'll eat the apples when food is scarce in the winter months. Jess wonders if someone is storing the acorns. He and the puppies go back to the tree and wait. Soon a Squirrel pops out from the tree and buries another acorn. Jess and the pups are glad they didn't play with the acorns. Squirrel's storing them for Winter. They've answered the question – yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep52
programme.desc: How Can I Sound Like Brown Bird? - Brown Bird sings a lovely song before leaving for winter migration. Jess would love to sound like Brown Bird – then they could listen to her song all year round. But how can he sound like her? That's the Big Question. Billie and Baa suggest Jess sings but his singing voice doesn't sound like Brown Bird at all. Mimi tries to mimic Brown Bird by whistling but that's not the right sound either. Maybe if Jess makes a hooty sound by blowing through his paws? That's still not the right sound. Jess tells his friends that it's more of a whistley sound – a bit like the wind whistling through the reeds at Horace's pond. So they go to the pond. Horace shows Jess how to blow through the reeds – and it sounds just like Brown Bird. They've found the Answer. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep13
programme.desc: Karmageddon / Chet Gets Burned - Turbo is excited to race on a freeway that is closed for construction, but he needs to complete a series of favors for the crew before he can go. // Burn breaks up with Chet after he forgets her birthday. To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.desc: Norway Out - Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rupert & The Octopus’S Garden - Ping Pong's magic accidentally brings a picture of an Octopus to life and the friends need to stop it causing chaos.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73
programme.desc: Violet'S Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Race to the Top / Meet Harl Hubbs - Fendrich and Sinclair compete to win the City's tallest building contest. // An off-screen narrator, narrates a day in the life of helpful handyman, Harl Hubbs.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep103
programme.desc: POSTBOT 3000 / Boom Goes the Cloud - Angus agrees to compete against Mayor Peeve's new POSTBOT in a 'mail-off' to save the Middlemost Post. // Parker's anxiety escalates when the cloud appears to be the source of loud nightly thundering plaguing the town.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Squashed - When Alvin dreams of joining a private club, he volunteers Dave to play squash, even though Dave doesn't play.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Writer's Block - When Dave suffers from writer's block, Alvin pretends to write a broadway show, which only makes Dave feel worse.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Jinxed! - After Theodore sees Alvin accidentally ruin Dave's computer, Alvin jinxes Theodore so he won't be able to tell on him.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The Toy - A favorite toy of Theodore's is lost on a rafting trip but then mysteriously shows up at the house, and it's alive!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: Ink Lemonade - Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: Danger Force S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Twin It to Win It - Captain Man makes twin superheroes, ShoutOut and AWOL, compete over who can catch more criminals using their own ways of crime-fighting.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep104
programme.desc: House Rules - Thrash is impatient with the family rules and convinces Mo to push boundaries. But when a Decepticon needs their help, Mo and Thrash find themselves playing by a far more dangerous set of rules.

programme.title: Star Trek: Prodigy S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Supernova, Part 1 - Surrounded by the Federation armada, the crew attempts to stop their ship from destroying all of Starfleet.

programme.title: The Loud House S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Price of Admission / One Flu Over the Loud House - After seeing a scary movie (that his parents told him not to), Lincoln can’t go to sleep and pulls an all-nighter. // When a common cold ravages through the loud house, Lincoln believes his sisters have turned into Zombies!

programme.title: Big Nate S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Time Disruptors - A local legend comes to life as Nate and friends prepare for an epic Halloween. But Nate's awesome plans may be foiled as a mysterious presence stalks the students and Francis disappears for hours at a time over at Jefferson.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep138
programme.desc: The Play's The Thing / Rodeo Daze - Mr. Krab opens a Dinner Theater at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob takes his pals to Texas to see Sandy in a squirrel rodeo.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep110
programme.desc: The Slumber Party / Grooming Gary - Pearl's getting ready for her slumber party, but Mr. Krabs' meddling in the party preparations is getting out of control. // SpongeBob decides to enter Gary in a pet show and gives him a makeover after seeing the competition.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Sporty Parker / Hammy Time - Parker makes the Yellow Springs soccer team, which thrills Angus since he never had the chance to play growing up. // Parker brings home a hamster the Middlemost Post falls in love with, but this love quickly turns to jealousy.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Dine and Bash / Sofa, So Good - After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep609
programme.desc: The Last Laugh / Driver's Dread - Luan thinks Mr. Coconuts is out for revenge when she replaces him with Lola in her act. // Hoping to drive out to the outlets to meet Lori, Leni ooks for alternative ways to get her driver's license.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Strife Coach / Gossip Girl - Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke! // When a Sid secret is leaked at school, Ronnie Anne and Sid wonder if they can continue being best buds!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Dog's Best Friend / Out of Shape - Angus tries to woo the only dog on the mountain that doesn't like him: Jelly. // Parker becomes overly obsessed with a game to the point where the little nimbus isn't a cloud anymore.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep158
programme.desc: Sweet and Sour Squidward / The Googly Artiste - Plankton tries to befriend Squidward in an effort to steal the Krabby Patty formula. // Patrick tries desperately to supply everyone in Bikini Bottom with his highly demanded “rocks-with-googly-eyes,” after an art critic deems him a true artiste.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep159
programme.desc: A SquarePants Family Vacation - When SpongeBob and Patrick get lost on a family road trip to the Great Barrier Reef, they end up on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep160
programme.desc: Patrick's Staycation / Walking The Plankton - Patrick takes a break from the hustle and bustle of his daily life with some over-the-top pampering from SpongeBob. // When Karen and Plankton see Mr. Krabs on the same cruise, Plankton starts wondering who's minding the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep161
programme.desc: Mooncation / Mr. Krabs Takes a Vacation - Sandy only wanted to spend a relaxing vacation alone on the moon. But it seems she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket who doesn't share her idea. // On his trip to the Ocean Mint, Mr. Krabs learns that old money is shredded and burned.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Hometown Hero - When Mantis returns to his hometown claiming to be the Dragon Warrior to impress his ex-fiancé, Po pretends to be his sidekick who doesn't know kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Challenge Day - Shifu tells the citizens of the Valley of Peace that whoever can defeat Po before sunset will become the new Dragon Warrior. When Hundun hears of the challenge, he returns to the village to claim the title.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep214
programme.desc: City of Walls and Secrets - Aang and the kids finally arrive in Ba Sing Se to see the Earth King, only to find mysterious forces within the city conspiring to stop them. Meanwhile, Jet tries to find proof that Zuko and Uncle are Fire Nation.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S02 Ep223
programme.desc: A Visit from Uncle Nigel - Private's quirky Uncle Nigel pops in for a quick visit from across the pond.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep306

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep30
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
